MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY8 postcode area of Leven. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7.30pm to makes repairs to an overhead line pole near to Gilston East Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.15pm on 11th March 2021.
